rukus.text: 35|15|he manushyo! tum sabhee bhikshu ho allaah ke tatha allaah hee nihsvaarth, prashansit hai.
35|16|yadi vah chaahe, to tumhen dhvast kar de aur naee[1] utapatti le aaye.
35|17|aur ye nahin hai allaah par kuchh kathin.

35|18|tatha nahin laadega koee laadane vaala, doosare ka bojh, apane oopar[1] aur yadi pukaarega koee bojhal, use laadane ke lie, to vah nahin laadega usamen se kuchh, chaahe vah usaka sameepavartee hee kyon na ho. aap to bas unheen ko sachet kar rahe hain, jo darate hon apane paalanahaar se bin dekhe tatha jo sthaapana karate hain namaaz kee tatha jo pavitr hua, to vah pavitr hoga apane hee laabh ke lie aur allaah hee kee or (sabako) jaana hai.
35|19|tatha samaan nahin ho sakata andha tatha aankh vaala.
35|22|tatha samaan nahin ho sakate jeevit tatha nirjeev.[1] vaastav mein, allaah hee sunaata hai jise chaahata hai aur aap nahin suna sakate unhen, jo qabron mein hon.
35|24|vaastav mein, hamane aapako saty ke saath shubh soochak tatha sachetakarta banaakar bheja hai aur koee aisa samudaay nahin, jisamen koee sachetakarta na aaya ho.
35|25|aur yadi ye aapako jhuthalaayen, to inase poorv ke logon ne bhee jhuthalaaya hai, jinake paas hamaare rasool khule pramaan tatha granth aur prakaashit pustaken laaye.
35|26|phir mainne pakad liya unhen, jo kaafir ho gaye. to kaisa raha mera inkaar.
